description.content: Upload File to Pixelbin

formdata.description: Path where you want to store the asset. Path of containing folder
Name of the asset, if not provided name of the file will be used. Note - The provided name will be slugified to make it URL safe
Access level of asset, can be either `public-read` or `private`
Overwrite flag. If set to `true` will overwrite any file that exists with same path, name and type. Defaults to `false`.

If set to `true` will add unique characters to name if asset with given name already exists. If overwrite flag is set to `true`, preference will be given to overwrite flag. If both are set to `false` an error will be raised.

description.content: (Required) Asset file
Path where you want to store the asset. Path of containing folder
Name of the asset, if not provided name of the file will be used. Note - The provided name will be slugified to make it URL safe
Access level of asset, can be either `public-read` or `private`
Asset tags
Asset related metadata
Overwrite flag. If set to `true` will overwrite any file that exists with same path, name and type. Defaults to `false`.

If set to `true` will add unique characters to name if asset with given name already exists. If overwrite flag is set to `true`, preference will be given to overwrite flag. If both are set to `false` an error will be raised.
Upload Asset with url

For the given asset details, a S3 signed URL will be generated,
which can be then used to upload your asset.

item.name: listFiles | List and search files and folders.

request.name: listFiles | List and search files and folders.

description.content: List all files and folders in root folder. Search for files if name is provided. If path is provided, search in the specified path.

query.description: If true will fetch only files
If true will fetch only folders
Key to sort results by. A "-" suffix will sort results in descending orders.

description.content: Create a new folder at the specified path. Also creates the ancestors if they do not exist.

response.name: Success - List of all created folders

description.content: Get folder details

Update folder details. Eg: Soft delete it
by making `isActive` as `false`.
We currently do not support updating folder name or path.
Delete folder and all its children permanently.
